shortdesc.ph: Checks whether the music resource is preloaded.
Checks whether the music resource has been preloaded.
Checks whether the music resource has been preloaded.
Checks whether the music resource is preloaded.

section.p: This method is called synchronously. To preload a new music resource, call .
This method is a synchronous call. To preload a new music resource, call .
This method is a synchronous call. To preload a new music resource, call .
This method is a synchronous call. To preload a new music resource, call .

plentry.pd: The code of the music resource, used to identify a music resource.
The code of the music resource, used to identify a music resource.
The song code of the music resource, used to identify a music resource.
The code of the music resource, used to identify a music resource.

ul.li: 0: Success. The music resource has been preloaded.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
0: Success. The music resource has been preloaded.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
: The music resource has been preloaded.
: The music resource has not been preloaded.
0: Success. The music resource is preloaded.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
